title: Newly Renovated Colonial Villa Over Looking Paddy Fields
details: This colonial villa has been renovated to a very high standard and has three bedrooms each with an en-suite, a fully equipped kitchen, extensive living areas and verandas overlooking the fresh green paddy fields. Beautifully landscaped tropical gardens surround the house, with space to develop a swimming pool if desired. The property is located near Yatagala temple and is only a few minutes drive to Galle Fort, Unawatuna each and Talpe beach. It represents an ideal holiday rental property.
